Elements.Name: IsAirDash
Description: Enables the Air Dash that lets you Drop Dash in the air by boosting whilst charging a Drop Dash.
Default Controller Guide (recommended);

- Default: A + A + A (Hold) + RT
- Drop Dash on Double Jump: A + A (Hold) + RT
Default Keyboard Guide;

- Default: Space + Space + Space (Hold) + Shift
- Drop Dash on Double Jump: Space + Space (Hold) + Shift
Default: True

Elements.Name: AirDashWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Both

Elements.Name: AirDashUncurlTypeSV
Description: The behaviour of Drop Dash rolling when initiating it from the Air Dash in 2D areas.
Default: None

Elements.Name: AirDashUncurlType
Description: The behaviour of Drop Dash rolling when initiating it from the Air Dash in 3D areas.
Default: None

Elements.Name: AirDashInitialVelocitySV
Description: The starting velocity of the Air Dash in 2D areas.
Default: 15.0

Elements.Name: AirDashInitialVelocity
Description: The starting velocity of the Air Dash in 3D areas.
Default: 30.0

Elements.Name: IsAirDashNoCameraDelay
Description: Disables the camera delay for Drop Dash when performed via Air Dash.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsAirTricksEnhanced
Description: Enables enhancements for Air Tricks.
Default: True

Elements.Name: AirTrickMinBoostReward
Description: The minimum amount of boost energy rewarded for performing Air Tricks.
Default: 1.0

Elements.Name: AirTrickMaxBoostReward
Description: The maximum amount of boost energy rewarded for performing Air Tricks.
Default: 5.0

Elements.Name: AirTrickSamePenalty
Description:
The amount of bonus boost energy subtracted by performing the same Air Trick multiple times.
To disable this, set this to zero.
Default: 0.5

Elements.Name: AirTrickFatigueTime
Description:
The amount of air time (in seconds) after performing at least one Air Trick before reaching fatigue for boost energy rewards, reducing the maximum boost energy reward down to minimum.
To disable this, set this to zero.
Default: 75.0

Elements.Name: IsBulletDash
Description: Enables the Bullet Dash that lets you charge a Spin Dash in the air and aim in any direction with slow-mo.
Default Controller Guide (recommended);

- Charge: LT + Camera Stick (in the air)
- Aim: Camera Stick
- Release: RT
Default Keyboard Guide;

- Charge: F + Z/C (in the air)
- Aim: W/A/S/D
- Release: Shift
Default: True

Elements.Name: BulletDashWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Islands Only

Elements.Name: BulletDashInitialVelocitySV
Description: The starting velocity of the Bullet Dash in 2D areas.
Default: 50.0

Elements.Name: BulletDashInitialVelocity
Description: The starting velocity of the Bullet Dash in 3D areas.
Default: 75.0

Elements.Name: BulletDashCameraStickType
Description:
The analog stick used to aim Bullet Dash.
This will always be on W/A/S/D for keyboard users.
Default: Left

Elements.Name: BulletDashYawSensitivity
Description:
The sensitivity of moving the camera left and right.
To invert this, set this value to a negative number.
Default: 6.5

Elements.Name: BulletDashPitchSensitivity
Description:
The sensitivity of moving the camera up and down.
To invert this, set this value to a negative number.
Default: 3.25

Elements.Name: BulletDashActiveBoostConsumption
Description:
The amount of boost energy actively subtracted whilst charging Focus Dash.
To disable this, set this to zero.
Default: 2.5

Elements.Name: BulletDashMinPitchBoostConsumption
Description:
The amount of boost energy subtracted when releasing Focus Dash at a downward angle.
To disable this, set this to zero.
Default: 5.0

Elements.Name: BulletDashMaxPitchBoostConsumption
Description:
The amount of boost energy subtracted when releasing Focus Dash at an upward angle.
To disable this, set this to zero.
Default: 50.0

Elements.Name: IsBulletDashNoBoostReplenishment
Description: Disables the boost gauge automatically replenishing when releasing Focus Dash.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsBulletDashSuperStompTrajectory
Description:
Performs a Super Stomp upon landing when launching Focus Dash pointed at the ground.
Super Stomp creates a shockwave that damages surrounding enemies.
Default: True

Elements.Name: DropDashAirTrickCancel
Description:
Allows Sonic to perform Air Tricks when pressing the slide button whilst in the air.
This will not work in Cyber Space without at least the "Enable Flinging from Terrain in Cyber Space" code enabled.
Default: 3D only

Elements.Name: IsDropDashCancelWhenUngrounded
Description: Automatically cancels rolling when Sonic becomes ungrounded, allowing him to perform tricks.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsDropDashNoCameraDelay
Description: Disables the camera delay for Drop Dash.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsDropDashNoFans
Description:
Allows you to roll uninterrupted through fans without flying upwards. This is particularly useful for Air Dash.
Fans will be completely operational for all other cases except for rolling.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashSideViewRollFix
Description: Fixes Drop Dash getting stuck in 2D areas if you move the analog stick towards or away from the camera plane.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashEnhancedCyberPhysics
Elements.DisplayName: Use Enhanced Physics in Cyber Space
Description:
Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Drop Dash in Cyber Space.
These are identical to the parameters used by "Tighter Drop Dash Rotation" and will not conflict with other physics mods or codes.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsDropDashEnhancedIslandPhysics
Description:
Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Drop Dash on the islands.
These are identical to the parameters used by "Tighter Drop Dash Rotation" and will not conflict with other physics mods or codes.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsFlurryRush
Description: Enables the Flurry Rush that lets you enter slow-mo with full Phantom Rush when perfectly dodging an enemy attack inches away from being hit.
Default: True

Elements.Name: FlurryRushDuration
Description: The time (in seconds) Flurry Rush will last for.
Default: 6.0

Elements.Name: IsFlurryRushNoWildRush
Description: Disables Wild Rush for the time Flurry Rush is active to make dodging flow better into Phantom Rush.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsLightSpeedAttack
Description: Enables the Light Speed Attack that lets you charge a Spin Dash to supercharge Sonic, which releases a chain of powerful attacks towards nearby enemies.
Default: True

Elements.Name: LightSpeedAttackWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Both

Elements.Name: LightSpeedAttackChargeDuration
Description: The time (in seconds) required for the Light Speed Attack to fully charge.
Default: 3.5
Alternative: 2.0 (Crystal Ring)

Elements.Name: LightSpeedAttackDuration
Description:
The time (in seconds) Light Speed Attack will last for.
To disable this, set this to zero.
Default: 5.0

Elements.Name: LightSpeedAttackChargeVFX
Description: Enables extra particles when charging a Spin Dash.
Default: True

Elements.Name: LightSpeedAttackLightDashExit
Description: Finishes the Light Speed Attack with a standard Light Dash.
Default: True

Elements.Name: SlideDashActionTypeSV
Description: The behaviour for pressing the Slide button in 2D areas.
Default: Spin Move

Elements.Name: SlideDashActionType
Description: The behaviour for pressing the Slide button in 3D areas.
Default: Drop Dash

Elements.Name: IsSlideDashNoDropDashCameraDelay
Description: Disables the camera delay for Drop Dash when performed via Slide Dash.
Default: False

Elements.Name: SpinBoostInitialVelocityType
Description: The behaviour for the initial velocity for Spin Boost.
Default: None

Elements.Name: SpinBoostInitialVelocitySV
Description: The starting velocity of Spin Boost in 2D areas.
Default: 10.0

Elements.Name: SpinBoostInitialVelocity
Description: The starting velocity of Spin Boost in 3D areas.
Default: 20.0

Elements.Name: IsSpinBoostAlwaysTrickableExit
Description:
Allows Sonic to always trick when exiting out of Spin Boost whilst in the air.
This also fixes Sonic losing all momentum on exit when the analog stick is not neutral.
This will not work in Cyber Space without the "Enable Air Tricks in Cyber Space" code enabled.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinBoostInputReleaseCancel
Description: Exits out of Spin Boost the moment the input to keep boosting is released, rather than lingering for a couple of seconds.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsSpinBoostJumpRestore
Description:
Restores Spin Boost when jumping out of it and landing again, similar to Sonic Lost World.
This will perform a Spin Charge instead upon landing when double jumping out of Spin Boost.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinBoostEnhancedCyberPhysics
Elements.DisplayName: Use Enhanced Physics in Cyber Space
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Spin Dash in Cyber Space.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinBoostEnhancedIslandPhysics
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Spin Dash on the islands.
Default: True

Elements.Name: SpinChargeCameraShakeType
Description:
The amount of camera shake when charging a Spin Dash.
The "Restore Unused Spin Charge Camera Shake" code must be disabled for this option to apply.
Default: Medium

Elements.Name: SpinChargeControlType
Description: The control scheme for using Spin Dash.
Default: Frontiers

Elements.Name: SpinChargeInitialReleaseVelocitySV
Description: The starting velocity of the Spin Dash when released in 2D areas.
Default: 5.0

Elements.Name: SpinChargeInitialReleaseVelocity
Description: The starting velocity of the Spin Dash when released in 3D areas.
Default: 10.0

Elements.Name: SpinChargeTerminalReleaseVelocity
Description: The velocity bonus limit from charging a Spin Dash.
Default: 80.0

Elements.Name: SpinChargeVelocityDecayRate
Description: The rate at which the bonus velocity decays when the Spin Dash is released.
Default: 10.0

Elements.Name: SpinChargeMultiplier
Description: The multiplier added for every charge of the Spin Dash.
Default: 1.5

Elements.Name: SpinChargeHoldMultiplier
Description: The multiplier added for holding Spin Charge with the "Charge by Holding Input" option.
Default: 2.5

Elements.Name: IsSpinChargeInputCharge
Description: Increases the charge multiplier over time using the Velocity Multiplier value when holding the input used to charge a Spin Dash initially.
Default Controller Guide (recommended);

- Frontiers: B + LT (hold)
- Lost World: LT (hold)
Default Keyboard Guide;

- Frontiers: Ctrl + F (hold)
- Lost World: F (hold)
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinChargeNoAirCamera
Description: Disables the zoom camera when charging a Spin Dash in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinChargeNoAirDeceleration
Description:
Disables Sonic's velocity decelerating when charging a Spin Dash in the air.
This option is recommended with "Disable Air Camera".
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinChargeNoGroundCamera
Description:
Disables the zoom camera when charging a Spin Dash on the ground.
This option is recommended for the "Lost World" control scheme.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsSpinChargeBoostRelease
Description: Releases a Spin Dash when boosting whilst charging on the ground or in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinChargeVibration
Description:
Toggles controller vibration when charging a Spin Dash.
This supports the Xbox One and DualSense trigger motors.
For full support, please install the Xbox Extended Feature Support Driver via Steam.
Default: True

Elements.Name: SpinMoveTerminalVelocityType
Description: The behaviour for whether Sonic should Spin Boost when reaching terminal velocity for Spin Move.
Default: 2D only

Elements.Name: SpinMoveVelocityThresholdSV
Description:
The velocity Sonic must be at to allow him to damage objects in 2D areas.
To deal damage regardless of velocity, set this to zero.
Default: 10.0

Elements.Name: SpinMoveVelocityThreshold
Description:
The velocity Sonic must be at to allow him to damage objects in 3D areas.
To deal damage regardless of velocity, set this to zero.
Default: 15.0

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveAirBoostCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform an Air Boost whilst rolling in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveStompCancel
Description: Allows Sonic to perform a Stomp Attack whilst rolling in the air.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveCancelWhenUngrounded
Description: Automatically cancels rolling when Sonic becomes ungrounded, allowing him to perform tricks.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveEnhancedCyberPhysics
Elements.DisplayName: Use Enhanced Physics in Cyber Space
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Spin Move in Cyber Space.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsSpinMoveEnhancedIslandPhysics
Description: Use physics parameters that enhance movement with Spin Move on the islands.
Default: True

Elements.Name: IsQuickStompDash
Description: Enables the Quick Stomp Dash that lets you Drop Dash in the air by initiating a Stomp Attack past the specified velocity threshold.
Default Controller Guide (recommended);

- Default: A + B (when moving faster than the specified velocity threshold)
- Require Air Boost: A + RT + B
Default Keyboard Guide;

- Default: Space + Ctrl (when moving faster than the specified velocity threshold)
- Require Air Boost: Space + Shift + Ctrl
Default: False

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashWorldType
Description: The areas of the game this move is allowed to be used in.
Default: Islands Only

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashUncurlTypeSV
Description: The behaviour of Drop Dash rolling when initiating it from the Quick Stomp Dash in 2D areas.
Default: None

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashUncurlType
Description: The behaviour of Drop Dash rolling when initiating it from the Quick Stomp Dash in 3D areas.
Default: None

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashVelocityThresholdSV
Description:
The velocity Sonic must be at to allow him to Drop Dash in the air in 2D areas.
Set this to zero to Drop Dash regardless of velocity.
Default: 15.0

Elements.Name: QuickStompDashVelocityThreshold
Description:
The velocity Sonic must be at to allow him to Drop Dash in the air in 3D areas.
Set this to zero to Drop Dash regardless of velocity.
Default: 25.0

Elements.Name: IsQuickStompDashNoCameraDelay
Description: Disables the camera delay for Drop Dash when performed via Quick Stomp Dash.
Default: False

Elements.Name: IsQuickStompDashRequireAirBoost
Description:
Require Air Boost to perform a Quick Stomp Dash.
This will ignore the velocity threshold.
Default: True
Disables camera shake.
A subtle amount of camera shake.
A moderate amount of camera shake.
This restores the unused camera.
A high amount of camera shake.
An absurd amount of camera shake.
Allows you to roll until Drop Dash runs out.
Immediately uncurls when entering the state. This is useful if you have the Air Trick skill unlocked.
This will not work in Cyber Space without at least the "Enable Flinging from Terrain in Cyber Space" code enabled.
Uncurls when becoming grounded.
Use the left stick to aim Focus Dash.
Use the right stick to aim Focus Dash.
Uses default game behaviour.
Use static initial velocity values via the below fields.
Use Sonic's current velocity for the initial velocity, resorting to the below fields if too slow.
Disables Slide Dash.
Instantly Drop Dash by pressing the Slide button.
Begin rolling by pressing the Slide button.
The default control scheme.
Default Controller Guide (recommended);

- Start Charging: B (hold) + LT
- Charge: LT
- Release: B (release)/RT (press)
Default Keyboard Guide;

- Start Charging: Ctrl (hold) + F
- Charge: F
- Release: Ctrl (release)/Shift (press)
The control scheme that emulates Sonic Lost World.
Default Controller Guide (recommended);

- Start Charging: LT (hold)
- Charge: A/B
- Release: LT (release) + LT (hold)
Default Keyboard Guide;

- Start Charging: F (hold)
- Charge: Space/Ctrl
- Release: F (release) + F (hold)
The "Disable Ground Camera" option is recommended with this control scheme.
Disables this action.
This action is only available in 2D.
This action is only available in 3D.
This action is always available.
Allow this move to function both on the islands and in Cyber Space.
Allow this move to function only in Cyber Space.
Allow this move to function only on the islands.
